mean_cn: v. 说明已收到（信件等），承认…的权威（或主张），对…打招呼，对…表示感谢
mean_en: to express thanks or appreciation for (something or someone)
word_etyma: ac使 + knowledge了解 → acknowledge 承认，认知
short_phrase: acknowledge your hard work with a "Thank you"
sentence: "Darling, I'm pregnant. Please acknowledge this text."
sentence_trans: “亲爱的，我怀孕了，收到请回复。”
